definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to get married and have kids/to start a family
to get married soon after meeting

sentences.english: Mr. Black, I have just been married, therefore can I get a raise in my wages?
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生，我刚刚结婚了，所以我能提薪吗？

sentences.english: I finished watching the movie The Proposal this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我看完了电影《假结婚》。

sentences.english: Our parents didn't want us to marry, so we eloped .
sentences.chinese: 我们的父母亲不同意我们结婚，所以我们便私奔。

sentences.english: She married and divorced twice, stripping both husbands of their cash.
sentences.chinese: 她曾经结婚两次，把两任丈夫的钱全部洗劫了。

sentences.english: If he thinks I’d marry him， he has another think coming.
sentences.chinese: 如果他认为我会跟他结婚，那就大错特错了。

sentences.english: One friend sewed her wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 一个朋友给她缝制了结婚礼服。

sentences.english: I said, "Your Honor, I had Sex before I got married."
sentences.chinese: 我说，“庭上，结婚前我就有性生活了。”

sentences.english: Eva's wedding album holds only a faint glimmer of the wedding itself.
sentences.chinese: 埃娃的结婚相册仅仅保存了婚礼本身暗弱的影像。

sentences.english: Such images have contributed to the taboo against marriage between first cousins.
sentences.chinese: 这样的病态归咎于对近亲结婚禁忌的违背。

sentences.english: We've only been dating two days; it's nowhere near a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我们才谈了两个月的恋爱，还谈不上结婚的事。

sentences.english: I got a marriage certificate on my wall.
sentences.chinese: 我得到的结婚证书对我的墙。

sentences.english: Do you think Chris and Tind will get married soon?
sentences.chinese: 你认为克里斯和蒂娜会很快就结婚吗？

sentences.english: We have not married Qiana , you are not only read my photograph.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没有结婚的钱啊，你不也是只看过我的像片。

sentences.english: You tell her you're married?- She knows.
I was going to marry with the man traveler.
sentences.chinese: 我和公驴打算明年结婚。

definition: to get married and have kids/to start a family
marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy
to get married soon after meeting (abbr. for 閃電結婚|闪电结婚[shan3 dian4 jie2 hun1]) (neologism c. 2005)
to obtain a certificate or license etc/(PRC) to obtain a marriage license/to marry
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
